dame.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a humorous female character in a pantomime (=a special play at Christmas) who is played by a man
dame.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a British title given to a woman as an honour for achievement or for doing good things, or a woman who has this title
dame.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She was made a Dame in 1992.
